title: lokking for a bronze/silver ranked team
body: I am bronze 1 I main jg pls add if you would like me in your ranked team as I am looking forward to having some fun before the season ends plus I am online 24/7

replies.body: hey, im creating a bronze/silver ranked team, but unfortunately we have a jungle, what we need to is a top laner, im not sure if that helps, but just figured i'd give you an option if you want it message me :)
ok im keen I added you

added you, we could use a mid laner, we have top covered, if thats good with you, we are just a casual team looking to have some fun though, so if that fits for you its all good, and we just wanna see where we can play and try what we can
